name: 6 Week Lord
description:
You morn the passing of your brother you are next in line to inherit

his lands and his debts

you have six weeks to make things right with his people and the debt collectors

To play:

Move around with A & D

Interact with E

Talk to the adviser to see how everything is going and rest up when you have answered two questions.

See how you did at the end.

this is a rough idea of what I was aiming for. Many of the key features I wanted to implement are missing and what here serves to show what I was aiming for. I will keep working on this, all comments and critiqe is welcome.
